item.description:
The show first debuted at the Portsmouth Gas Light Co last year to a sold out audience. The All New line up for the February 1st show includes host Mark Scalia, Will Smalley, Jeff Keon, Brian Ronan and Mike Cote. "

 

 The show features a revolving lineup of male standup comedians who share different (but very male) observations on the world around them. Over the course of  95 minutes, they share their points of view on wives, mothers, friends, kids, careers, neighbors, growing older, love, lust, Internet dating and other things you won't believe they've wasted time thinking about.

After the show dance the night away with friends as renowned DJs from the Seacoast and Boston spin the hottest tunes. Meet new friends over the latest martinis served by the city’s best bartenders. You’ll feel like you’re on top of the world at the Third Floor. Tickets for the show are $20 in advance   and can be purchased at www.drinkwaterproductions.com . Check the website for more details.
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a table for meetup members
item.name: How Men Think(Or Do They?) Comedy Tour-ALL New Line Up!
